data.title: Konnartist, Sean Lacroix, Apollyon's Visage, Voice Industrie
data.meta_description:
World Mother: Seed Me Novel Score by Konnartist, Sean Lacroix, Apollyon's Visage, Voice Industrie, released 02 July 2016

1. Sean Lacroix - Whyte Ave Waltz
2. Konnartist - The Children
3. Konnartist - River Valley Walker
4. Konnartist - Wild Magic
5. Konnartist - River Valley Deepstalker
6. Konnartist - Disciple's Ritual
7. Apollyon's Visage - World Mother
8. Konnartist - Hellfire
9. Voice Industrie - Plod in Mud
10. Konnartist - Sprout

This album is the musical interpretation of the novel Seed Me by Konn Lavery.

Special thanks to:
Alan Levesque of Teknik 14 and Voice Industrie for his knowledge, critical feedback and dedication to work with me on this project. Chris Lacroix and Joana Carballo of Apollyon’s Visage and Sean Lacroix for their time and high quality contribution to their tracks on the album. Kyle Lavery and Lindsey Molyneaux for their numerous listens and feedback on the demos. Nastassja Brinker for her photography work. Thanks to all my friends and family for their continuous support with my writing and creative explorations of transmedia storytelling.

If you haven’t read the novel, find the Seed Me novel at seedmenovel.com.
